Genetic Inference Methods Based on GWAS Data (e.g., Colocalization Analysis, Mendelian Randomization) 2. carousel.title: AI Assistant for Researchers
items: Boost your research efficiency with academic Q&A and AI reading modules.
Integrated domain data and tools to minimize model hallucination.
Powered by advanced AI models like FutureGene, GPT-4o, o1, Claude and DeepSeek R1.

items.title: Scientific Programming
items.desc: Interpreting and generating code, data analysis and visualization.

advan: Retrieve info from arXiv, PubMed to reduce hallucination.
disadvan: Relies on internal data, may cause hallucination.
Generates responses from training data, no real-time updates.

advan: Data includes research papers, textbooks, and reference books.
disadvan: Trained on general data, lacks specialized knowledge.

advan: Includes calculators and scripts for accurate calculations and data processing.
Calls external tools with simple commands for complex programming.
disadvan: Lacks calculation tools, prone to math errors.
No script tools, weak in code programming.

items.title: Academic QA
items: Multimodal conversations with text and image analysis.
Search databases like PubMed and arXiv.
Clear citations with summaries, journal names, dates, and links.

items.title: AI Reading
items: Highlight content for questions, translations, and explanations.

items.title: Paper Editing
items: Proofread and polish sentences, correct grammar, and suggest better vocabulary.
Generate reference lists that meet journal requirements.

items.title: AI Podcast
items: Upload your study materials to generate an engaging podcast.
Turn dry paper reading into efficient audio learning.
Supported document formats include PDF, Word, TXT, PPT, URL and Text.

comment.title: Endorsed by 90% of faculties and students of Westlake University. Positive reviews from professors!

faq.title: FAQ
faq.questionScan: For any questions, please contact customer service.
faq.productScan: Scan the QR code to follow and get more product updates.

items.question: Is invoicing supported?
items.answer: Invoicing is supported for both individuals and teams (category: technical services). Please contact customer service to request an invoice.

items.question: Which disciplines are supported?
items.answer: WestlakeChat supports a wide range of scientific disciplines, particularly in life sciences, medicine, chemistry, physics, computer science, materials science, environmental science, and engineering.

items.question: Does the model have hallucinations?
items.answer: WestlakeChat's model is designed to reduce errors and inconsistencies in generated content through the use of large-scale pre-trained language models and supervised learning techniques, enhancing reliability and accuracy. In terms of RAG, it supplements external knowledge bases such as arXiv and PubMed, and also integrates tools like calculators and script programs. The model is regularly updated and optimized to adapt to new research developments and data changes. When generating content, the model attempts to verify the accuracy of information from multiple sources to minimize errors.

items.question: Which models are supported?
items.answer: In addition to our self-developed FutureGene model, WestlakeChat integrates Claude 3.5, o1-preview, and GPT-4. These models are available to platform premium members.

items.question: How does it differ from Sider and Poe?
items.answer: WestlakeChat is an open-source tool based on RAG that supports multimodal question answering and various complex reasoning capabilities. It can perform question answering on documents consisting of multiple images and tables, and it supports multimodal document parsing. Through simple dialogue, users can obtain in-depth insights and answers from the documents. On the other hand, tools like Sider and Poe focus more on the simple integration and invocation of existing language model interfaces. Although Poe also has RAG, most of its searches are conducted on general websites rather than specialized libraries (and it does not support issuing invoices).

content: WestlakeChat is an AI intelligent platform jointly developed by Westlake Future Gene and Westlake University. It is specifically designed for researchers, aiming to provide an efficient and convenient research assistant tool. The platform integrates functions such as academic Q&A, paper editing, AI reading. It supports real-time multi-modal dialogue, fast retrieval of papers, text editing and translation, quick question and answer summarization of articles. This greatly enhances the efficiency and convenience of scientific research and teaching work.
1. Powerful search function: Using RAG technology, it accesses external knowledge bases such as arXiv and PubMed to generate citation lists.
2. Tool invocation: It supplements calculator, script programs, and other tools, providing accurate calculation and data processing capabilities.
3. Training on domain-specific data: The data covers abundant resources such as research papers, textbooks, and reference books in the field of science.
4. Multimodal dialogue: It supports in-depth analysis and interaction of text and images.

In addition to training on professional domain data, WestlakeChat also integrates external literature databases, allowing for precise identification of cutting-edge research achievements. Users only need to input relevant questions, such as "Please find important research papers on amyotrophic lateral sclerosis published in Nature Cell," and the system can quickly present search results, including journal authors, publication dates, and other detailed information, accompanied by brief Chinese abstracts and paper links. By clicking on the links, users can directly access the corresponding article page and further explore the reference literature. The one-sentence Chinese abstract is particularly user-friendly for native Chinese speakers as it allows for a quick overview of the important content of related literature.

The academic Q&A module can also assist you in various scenarios through natural language, such as helping you compose a professional email response, organizing the paper format required by the journal for submission, writing a complex Python code, and so on.

WestlakeChat supports multimodal dialogue functionality, whether it is precise understanding and response to text information or in-depth analysis and interactive processing of non-text data such as images. Users can click, drag, or paste images for uploading, and the system will analyze the content and provide detailed explanations and answers. For example, users can upload an image from a paper, and the system will parse the image content and provide relevant scientific explanations and suggestions.
1. On the Q&A page, users can click on the "Modify" button on the right side to support rephrasing a question that has already been submitted.
2. After the model answers on the user question page, it supports the functions of copying, liking, and disliking.
3. The conversation list on the left supports renaming or deleting conversations.

Writing high-quality academic papers requires not only solid expertise in the field but also good written English expression skills. The text editing feature provided by WestlakeChat can assist authors in refining sentence structures, correcting grammar errors, providing professional academic English translations, and even suggesting more appropriate vocabulary choices.

Modern scientific research often involves a large amount of data analysis and program development. WestlakeChat utilizes a variety of programming resources, such as calculators, script programs, and useful code snippets, to help users reduce the barriers to programming. You only need to input complex code, and WestlakeChat will generate detailed explanations. Of course, if you want the model to write programs for you, you can also directly input your programming requirements into the Q&A module, and WestlakeChat will output detailed programming ideas and examples.

Reading a large amount of literature is an important component of scientific research work. WestlakeChat makes this process more efficient. Users only need to upload PDF files, and the system can quickly extract key points, generate concise and clear summaries, assisting users in quickly understanding the main theme of the paper. At the same time, it also generates related question suggestions, saving valuable time and energy for researchers.

The AI reading function of WestlakeChat is not limited to generating summaries. Users can also ask questions, translate, and explain specific content in the text, and the AI can help users deeply understand and provide detailed answers and explanations.
1. Click on the upper left corner of the functional area to support PDF zooming and page selection, making it convenient for users to quickly select and browse through the content.
2. Click on the 'PDF' button in the bottom right corner to freely switch between reading mode or question-and-answer mode.

On the path of academic research, time is precious and efficiency is crucial. To help researchers and students acquire and digest academic information more efficiently, we have launched the "AI Podcast" function, making your learning and research more enjoyable and interesting.

Simply upload your academic papers, research reports, or professional books, and we will automatically generate engaging and insightful podcast audio for you. Currently supported file formats include PDF, Word, TXT, and PPT.

Our podcasts use advanced voice synthesis technology to ensure that every audio segment is clear, smooth, and vivid, providing you with an enjoyable listening experience. We generate Chinese audio specifically to offer a better experience for native Chinese speakers.

To help you quickly grasp the key points of the paper, our system provides intelligent summaries and keyword extraction, highlighting the core points of the paper. You can pause the podcast at any time to review the summary sections, enhancing the efficiency of your learning and research.

You can share links or scan QR codes via WeChat to listen to the podcasts anytime, making learning more convenient. If you find the content particularly interesting, you can easily share it with WeChat friends or post it on your Moments.

newsDetails.title: AI Podcast Now in Beta
details: 1. Support for a variety of document formats including PDF, Word, txt, and PPT
2. Upload learning materials to generate an interesting Chinese podcast
3. Support sharing with WeChat friends or posting to Moments

2. Optimized display of frequently asked questions and literature list
3. Enhanced user experience in reading scenarios

details: 1. WestlakeChat search provides literature aggregation capabilities
2. Precise keyword matching, finding more relevant content
3. Better understanding of Chinese, generating summaries friendly to native speakers

2. Reading scenes support AI copilot mode, circle paragraphs for translation, explanation, and questioning
3. Access to GPT-o1 model, support for multiple language versions

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.suggestion: Recommendations: Students should use the Basic Version for daily literature searches and paper editing. Users requiring complex model reasoning should opt for the Advanced Version.

announcement.title: Announcement
announcement.message:
Thank you for your support and companionship over the past year. Our Early Bird Price promotion (＄10/month) will officially end on December 31, 2024. After that, the product price will return to ＄20/month, with a discounted price of ＄16/month. 
We promise that WestlakeChat will continue to provide the most professional and thoughtful service as always. Once again, thank you for your support and understanding. We wish you a successful research and a happy New Year!

items.question: How to register an account?
items.answer: Click on "Sign up", choose the relevant subscription service, fill in the account information, and complete the online payment to activate the account.

items.question: What payment methods are supported?
items.answer: Currently, we support WeChat Pay, and in the future, we will also support Alipay and credit card payments.

items.question: Is refund available?
items.answer: If you have successfully made a payment but the order failed to be purchased, you can contact customer service for a refund. However, if the payment has been successfully processed and the service has taken effect, refunds are currently not supported.

items.question: Why is there a difference in price between the Chinese version and the international version?
items.answer: Given that our overseas operations involve higher costs, including cross-border payment fees and server network support, the fees for the international version will be slightly increased. We are committed to providing high-quality, smooth, and stable services to users worldwide.

items.question: Is invoice issuance supported?
items.answer: You may contact customer service to issue an invoice.

contactUs.title: You can contact us if you have any questions.
